transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I take people to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 Many kids ride me to get to school
🛑 I usually stop at designated stops
🚌 I am big and yellow (sometimes!)

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly above the clouds
✈️ I have wings and engines
🌍 I travel to different countries

transport.question: I go on the water and can carry lots of people and things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float on the ocean
⚓ I often have an anchor
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦶 You pedal me to make me go
🚴 I need a helmet for safety
🛣️ I can go on roads and paths

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can go underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I can be found in cities
🔊 I make a rumbling sound
⚡ I use electricity to run

transport.question: I am like a motorcycle but have three wheels. What am I?

hints.text: ⚙️ I have an engine
🚧 Construction workers sometimes use me
⚖️ I am very stable

transport.question: I am a small vehicle that can fly straight up. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I have a spinning blade on top
⚕️ Used to rescue people.
🏥 I can land on the roof of a hospital.

transport.question: I travel on the water and can go underwater. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I explore the ocean depths
🔎 I am shaped like a tube
🐠 I can see fish through my windows

transport.question: I help pull other vehicles along the road. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am a strong vehicle
🚜 I have a hook to connect to other cars
🚨 I sometimes have flashing lights and a siren

transport.question: I travel far, far away, past the moon and the stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go into space
👩‍🚀 Astronauts use me
🪐 I can visit other planets

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and have a big mouth. I like to say, 'Glub, glub!' What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I'm an animal that lives underwater.
🌊 I'm not a whale or a shark.
👄 I have scales and fins.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and cover most of the Earth. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water.
🚢 You can find whales and dolphins in me.
🌎 I surround all the land.

ocean.question: I'm a creature with eight arms that lives in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change colors to hide.
🔎 I don't have bones.
🖐 I have many arms, but not a hand.

ocean.question: I am a home to many sea creatures. I am made of colorful animals and plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I provide shelter for fishes.
🧱 I am built with tiny animals.
🌈 I have many shapes and colors.

ocean.question: I'm a very large sea animal that breathes air and has a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
💦 I spout water from my head.
🌊 I am the largest animal on earth.

ocean.question: I am long and thin, I look like a snake but I swim in the ocean, what am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I am not a snake on land.
🌊 Some of us are electric.
🐠 I am a type of fish.

ocean.question: I have a shell and walk very slowly on the seabed. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.
⏳ I am very, very slow.

ocean.question: I'm a very old and powerful force in the ocean, going up and down each day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I am affected by the moon.
🌊 I am a rise and fall of the sea level.
⏰ I happen twice a day.

ocean.question: I am a large and powerful predator of the sea. I have many sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a fish, but not a gentle one.
⚔️ I'm known to attack surfers.
💪 I am at the top of the ocean food chain.

ocean.question: I am a sandy landform surrounded by water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏝 I am smaller than a continent.
🌴 You can find me in warm waters.
⛱ People come to me to vacation.
